zh.title: 积分管理
zh.introduce: 贸易通过日常操作获得积分，当贸易获得的积分达到一定数量时，可以参与今后的积分抽奖，抵用，兑换活动

tasklist.title: 好任务，看不停
tasklist.text: 每天查看5次任务，可以获得5积分

tasklist.title: 分享送积分
tasklist.text: 每次分享，可以获得30积分

tasklist.title: 认证送积分
tasklist.text: 完成手机，实名认证，可以获得100积分

tasklist.title: 交稿送积分
tasklist.text: 每天交稿5次，可以获得10积分

tasklist.title: 注册送积分
tasklist.text: 完成注册，可以获得50积分

tasklist.title: 设置送积分
tasklist.text: 完成位置设置，可以获得50积分

en.title: Point management
en.introduce: Points are earned through daily operations. When the points obtained through trade reach a certain amount, they can participate in future bonus draw, offset and exchange activities

tasklist.title: Good job. Keep watching
tasklist.text: 5 credits can be earned by checking 5 tasks per day

tasklist.title: Sharing points
tasklist.text: Each time you share, you get 30 points

tasklist.title: Certification credit
tasklist.text: You get 100 points for your mobile phone if you complete the real-name authentication

tasklist.title: Credits for delivery
tasklist.text: You get 10 credits for submitting 5 times a day

tasklist.title: Registration points
tasklist.text: You get 50 points for completing registration

tasklist.title: Set send integral
tasklist.text: Complete the position setting, you can get 50 credits

tasklist.title: Credits exchange
tasklist.text: You can't run out of rewards
